presetNotes: Base tank is the only role than can use cryptbloom (4 piece), you should be fine to learn current aod with power armour. Im not really sure if wrist wraps are better than deathtouch brace, but as you get more experience in the fight you will probably move to mage/melee hybrid since thats the next step (and you need a deathtouch brace for that preset)

equipmentSlots.name: Elite tectonic mask
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes: I use normal tectonic mask because i cba to use a dye or pay 100m+ for a helm
equipmentSlots.label: etectohelm

equipmentSlots.name: Igneous Kal-Zuk
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes: A normal Igneous Kal-Mej at least to get the boost of Omnipower, consider getting this upgrade asap
equipmentSlots.label: kalzuk

equipmentSlots.name: Essence of Finality amulet (green)
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes:
Guthix staff spec (Abs shouldnt be used at aod)
Was only used for kills higher than 2min before fsoa rework, not anymore
equipmentSlots.label: eofgreenunorn

equipmentSlots.name: Ancient lantern
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes: Can be swapped with a regular shield, but you already have the lantern, this is fine
equipmentSlots.label: lantern

equipmentSlots.name: Deathtouched bracelet
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes: Can be swapped for Kerapac's wrist wraps
equipmentSlots.label: dtb

equipmentSlots.name: Blast diffusion boots
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes: Bis boots (They also reduce the time to fully charge detonate)
equipmentSlots.label: diffusion

equipmentSlots.name: Reaver's ring
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes: Bis ring, can be swapped with channeler's ring
equipmentSlots.label: reaverring

equipmentSlots.name: Grasping rune pouch (blue)
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes: Body | Soul | Blood | Astral (Can fill however you want)
equipmentSlots.label: graspingpouchblue

equipmentSlots.name: Maniacal aura
equipmentSlots.breakdownNotes: Zerk auras are the only option for AoD since the high defence of the bird
equipmentSlots.label: mani

inventorySlots.name: Flanking perk
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: Optional but strongly suggested
inventorySlots.label: flank

inventorySlots.name: Luck of the dwarves
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: Switch before the end of the kill for t4 luck
inventorySlots.label: lotd

inventorySlots.name: Combat dummy MKII
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: Optional to lose target for your detonate
inventorySlots.label: dummy

inventorySlots.name: Grasping rune pouch
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: Water | Fire | Air | Chaos (Can fill however you want)
inventorySlots.label: graspingpouch

inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: Core food (Good to clear poison from pillar if you dont have elder salve and doesnt drain stats like saradomin brew)
inventorySlots.label: grest

inventorySlots.name: Adrenaline renewal flask (6)
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes: Can be a 4(or 2) dose, will only be used twice in slow teams (+2:00 min) and once in faster teams (-1:50 min)
inventorySlots.label: renewal6

inventorySlots.name: Powerburst of acceleration (4)
inventorySlots.breakdownNotes:
Used to move around pillars in faster teams
Used to get out of ice mechanic
inventorySlots.label: accel4
